CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_POWER_ON_CFM
CMD.Function: response about power on the WFD function

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_POWER_OFF_CFM
CMD.Function: response about power off the WFD function

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

Param.Name: sid
Param.Meaning: The current state

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_START_SCAN_REQ
CMD.Function: Request start scan the miracast devices

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

Param.Name: ssidLen
Param.Meaning: The lenth of ssid

Param.Name: ssid
Param.Meaning: ssid of remote device

Param.Name: mac
Param.Meaning: macaddress of remote device

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of completed

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_STOP_SCAN_REQ
CMD.Function: Request stop scan the miracast devices

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

Param.Name: mac
Param.Meaning: The mac address of device which to connect

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_ACCEP_INVITE_REQ
CMD.Function: Request accept the invite from peer device

Param.Name: mac
Param.Meaning: The mac address of device which to connect

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_REJECT_INVITE_REQ
CMD.Function: Request reject the invite from peer device

Param.Name: mac
Param.Meaning: The mac address of device which to connect

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_DISCONNECT_DEVICE_REQ
CMD.Function: Request to disconnect the connected device

Param.Name: mac
Param.Meaning: The mac address of device which to connect

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_DISCONNECT_CFM
CMD.Function: response about disconnect the connected device

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_SET_SURFACEID_REQ
CMD.Function: Request set the surface id to display

Param.Name: id
Param.Meaning: The surface id for display

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_SET_SURFACEID_CFM
CMD.Function: Response of setting the surface id to display

Param.Name: state
Param.Meaning: The error number of previous REQ

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_SEND_TOUCHDATA_REQ
CMD.Function: request to send UIBC touch data

Param.Name: typeID
Param.Meaning: The type ID of the touch data

Param.Name: dataLen
Param.Meaning: The data length

Param.Name: data
Param.Meaning: the coordinate value

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_SEND_ZOOMDATA_REQ
CMD.Function: request to send UIBC zoom data

Param.Name: coordData
Param.Meaning: The coordinate value of the center point

Param.Name: zoomTimes
Param.Meaning: The zoom times

CMD.Name: GONI_WFD_SEND_ROTATEDATA_REQ
CMD.Function: request to send UIBC zoom data

Param.Name: rotateInteger[10]
Param.Meaning: The signed integer portion of the amount to rotate in units in radians.

Param.Name: rotateFraction
Param.Meaning: The fraction portion of the amount to rotate in units of radians.
